quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因"shoot"的"射击"本义或字面直译，将"to shoot up"误解为"向上开枪"或"用力投掷"。
quiz_item.sentence: Our daughter has **shot up** by 12 cm this year—she can now reach the top shelf of the cupboard!

option.definition: to grow or increase very quickly
to fire a gun towards the sky
to throw something up with force
to jump up suddenly in surprise
